data.message:
Hello there ;)

My name is Alex and i've been following your fanpage for quite a while now. I'm a semi-professional photographer -  it's  my hobby, my passion and, to be honest, a part of my life. I'd be very pleased if you would be interested in visiting my site and checking out some of my  recent photos. It'd be really helpful if you could recommend it (by mutual interest, recommendation for recommendation) and let me share my works with bigger and more varied audience from all over the world. If  any question or ambiguity appears do not hesitate to message me. :) 

Thank You in advance. 
Your help will not go unnoticed and will not be forgotten.
https://www.facebook.com/dargiewiczphotography
